item.title: Live Updates: Police Say Deadly Attack Outside U.K. Synagogue Was Terrorism
item.description: The assailant died after being shot by officers, and two people were arrested, the police said. The attack killed two people in Manchester, England, o...

item.title: 4 People Injured After Stabbing Outside Manchester Synagogue, UK Police Say
item.description: The stabbing in Manchester, England, came on Yom Kippur, the holiest day in the Jewish calendar.

item.title: At Saudi Comedy Festival, American Free Speech Becomes the Punchline

item.title: Here’s how the U.K. police determine whether an attack is terrorism.
item.description: The authorities have not yet said whether an attack at a synagogue in Manchester is considered to be an act of terrorism.
